channel.title: Need help getting started
channel.description:
Hello, im currently in afghanistan and internet is slow here so i decided to figure out how to get my own RSPS to play solo in my down time. I finally figured out how to get a server/client up and running...im currently playing around with runedream and Project Fr0z3n and was able to log in and start playing...but when I logg in i spawn in what I believe is edgeville, and after running outside the town I notice there are no NPC's and nothing is interactive...am I missing something? What do I need to do to get that fixed? Basically I just want to get this game as close to the original as possible and just be able to play solo in my off time. Also a tutorial on some really basic beginner stuff for setting up a server would be pretty cool. Ive done a lot of searching but the internet is terribly slow here so it takes forever to find anything and I've had no luck.
Any help on this would be awesome and really appreciated thanks.
PS: although I'm pretty new to java the whole server emulator thing isnt TOO new to me...ive played around making my own ragnarok online server and editing it a great deal, although this is very different.

item.title: Need help getting started
item.dc:creator: @tannerdanger tannerdanger
item.description:
@tannerdanger wrote:

Hello, im currently in afghanistan and internet is slow here so i decided to figure out how to get my own RSPS to play solo in my down time. I finally figured out how to get a server/client up and running…im currently playing around with runedream and Project Fr0z3n and was able to log in and start playing…but when I logg in i spawn in what I believe is edgeville, and after running outside the town I notice there are no NPC’s and nothing is interactive…am I missing something? What do I need to do to get that fixed? Basically I just want to get this game as close to the original as possible and just be able to play solo in my off time. Also a tutorial on some really basic beginner stuff for setting up a server would be pretty cool. Ive done a lot of searching but the internet is terribly slow here so it takes forever to find anything and I’ve had no luck.

Any help on this would be awesome and really appreciated thanks.

PS: although I’m pretty new to java the whole server emulator thing isnt TOO new to me…ive played around making my own ragnarok online server and editing it a great deal, although this is very different.
